title: TUTSPLUS ADVANCED TECHNIQUES IN CORELDRAW TUTORIAL
description:
In this course you'll learn advanced rendering and vector
techniques, including creating and using custom sprayer
brushes, using gradient meshes to render shapes and
objects, using gradients and other interactive tools to
render objects, and using textures and text to add quick
details to an illustration. You will primarily use basic
shapes to build a digital still-life scene, allowing you to
focus more on lighting and shadow and less on drawing. You
will learn how to balance your design with a harmonious
color palette and play around with composition. In the end
you'll have illustrated a still life that's completely made
up, but retains a semi-realistic feel and is a great
jumping-off point for advancing your digital illustration
skill set
